name: qc
description: QuickCourt - A Local Sports Booking Overview QuickCourt is a platform that enables sports enthusiasts to book local sports facilities (e.g., badminton courts, turf grounds, tennis tables) and create or join matches with others in their area. Your goal is to build a full-stack web application that facilitates this end-to-end expe- rience, ensuring a smooth user experience, booking accuracy, and community engagement.
